moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Leer
moves.description: The opposing team gains an intimidating leer with sharp eyes. The opposing team's Defense stats are reduced.

moves.name: Bite
moves.description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. It may make the target flinch.

moves.name: Bide
moves.description: The user endures attacks for two turns, then strikes back to cause double the damage taken.

moves.name: Detect
moves.description: It enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

moves.name: Sand Attack
moves.description: Sand is hurled in the target's face, reducing its accuracy.

moves.name: Crunch
moves.description: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. It may also lower the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Hypnosis
moves.description: The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the target fall into a deep sleep.

moves.name: Super Fang
moves.description: The user chomps hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. It cuts the target's HP to half.

moves.name: After You
moves.description: The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user.

moves.name: Work Up
moves.description: The user is roused, and its Attack and Sp. Atk stats increase.

moves.name: Hyper Fang
moves.description: The user bites hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Mean Look
moves.description: The user pins the target with a dark, arresting look. The target becomes unable to flee.

moves.name: Baton Pass
moves.description: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting, passing along any stat changes.

moves.name: Slam
moves.description: The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, etc., to inflict damage.
